Author: SemicolonButterfly
Text: It’s certainly a relatable experience. I try to avoid good/bad labels though. I do try to be honest with myself about whether it’s sustainable, or an effective way of coping, or whether I want to keep teaching my brain that my needs don’t deserve to be met. Where I’m at right now is I see the answers are ‘no’, ‘no’, and ‘unsure’, but I’m struggling to find the willingness to change my behavior. It’s so easy to lie to myself about my motives. I hope you’ll be safe and be as gentle with yourself as you can manage <3
